page.title: 16Hellingly Grounds
page.content: The Hellingly grounds are used for many activities for the use of the patients and other people in the town. The main thing used by the public is the sports field which consists of one tennis court, one football pitch, one full sized cricket field and pavilion. There is also entertainment for the {workers }which is on the plot.There is also a convenient nursery for the { {workers children}if they choose. The { {workers, nurses, doctors}and{students may live in flats on the Hellingly grounds. Also there is grazing ground for some horses and cows. There's also a flower nursery on the grounds which is for the patients use. For the patients pleasure there are sometimes archery targets set up on the football field. The grounds are regular meeting places for sports activities, bonfire nights and other occasions.
